<<<<<<< HEAD
Characters of the virtues & vices of the age, or, Moral reflections, maxims, and thoughts upon men and manners translated from the most refined French wits ... and extracted from the most celebrated English writers ... : digested alphabetically under proper titles / by A. Boyer, Gent. Boyer, Abel, 1667-1729.
[17], 215 [i.e. 199] p.
Printed for Abel Roper, E. Wilkinson, and Roger Clavell ..., London : 1695.
First ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Published later as: The English Theophrastus. 1702. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
